name: Box Jump!
description:
Welcome to Box Jump! In this game, Boxy(the blue one) and his brother Noxy(the red one) have linked controls. So if Boxy jumps, Noxy jumps. If Boxy goes left Noxy goes left and so on. what isn't linked are the obstacles. So they have to survive while JOINED TOGETHER. If Boxy or Noxy die you lose! 

The obstacles are randomised so no level is the same but be warned, because of this there might be some very hard or even impossible jumps.

Controls

  • Left - A
  • Right - D
  • Jump - Space
